title: humanvelocity
author: humanvelocity
content: Someone's 0 gotta GO!!! Who you all got for this fight? I think Tank davis is going to win this one because I don't think Ryan has ever been in a situation where he is been tested like how tank is going to do with him. Its gonna be really interesting to see who's got a better chinÂ   .My prediction Tank Davis will win by TKO.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: You can now close this thread and just proceed to the thread where this topic has already been discussed since November of 2022.This is the link of that thread: [Boxing] Tank Davis vs. Ryan Garcia betting and discussion (May, 2023)Kindly lock the thread now and go to that thread for the discussion you want to have regarding this bout.
